meanings.definition: A disease caused by the consumption of the legume Lathyrus sativus, characterized by paralysis and muscle weakness.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with lathyrism after eating the toxic legume.
meanings.sent2: Farmers are cautious about planting Lathyrus sativus to prevent lathyrism outbreaks.
meanings.sent3: The lathyrism epidemic in the village led to a shortage of healthy workers.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of lathyrism loomed over the region, affecting many families.
meanings.sent5: The news of lathyrism spread like wildfire, causing panic among the villagers.

meanings.definition: The condition of being affected by lathyrism.
meanings.sent1: Her recovery from lathyrism was slow but steady.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to support those suffering from lathyrism.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lathyrism, he maintained a positive outlook on life.
meanings.sent4: The resilience of the survivors inspired hope in others with lathyrism.
meanings.sent5: The effects of lathyrism on the body were evident in every movement.
